backend/main.mo: Defines trip planning data types, user profiles, authorization, and CRUD-like functions for profiles and trips.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two navigation-related features to their affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles across the app.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining light/dark theme color variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gating, theme provider, and profile initialization logic.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, footer, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeading.t: Reusable section heading component with emoji and optional description.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate showing a login screen until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Modal dialog for entering and saving a user’s display name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/budget/BudgetEstim: Provides functions to calculate trip budget estimates based on cost assumptions for hotel, transport, food, and attractions.
frontend/src/features/budget/BudgetSecti: UI for adjusting budget assumptions, recalculating estimates, and saving updates to a trip’s budget.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/TripCard: Displays a trip summary card with navigation, duplication, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/TripsDas: Dashboard page showing a hero section and a grid or empty state for managing trip plans.
frontend/src/features/emergency/Emergenc: Manages emergency contacts for a trip, including adding, deleting, and showing template contacts.
frontend/src/features/emergency/emergenc: Generates default emergency contact templates based on the destination.
frontend/src/features/export/print.css: Print stylesheet defining A4 layout, typography, visibility rules, and color adjustments for printed trip plans.
frontend/src/features/export/TripPlanPri: Print-focused page that loads a trip plan, builds packing lists and weather tips, and renders itinerary and accommodations with print controls.
frontend/src/features/todos/todoModels.t: Utility functions for todo filtering and status checks such as overdue and due-today.
UI for viewing, filtering, adding, and completing trip-related to-dos with dialog and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/features/trip-planner/intak: Type definitions and validation for trip intake fields including dates, preferences, and budget info.
frontend/src/features/trip-planner/TripP: Multi-step wizard to collect trip intake data, validate inputs, and generate a trip plan before saving it.
frontend/src/features/trips/MapsNavigati: Renders must-visit places with buttons that open each location in external map apps.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanGene: Generates complete trip plans including itinerary, budget, accommodations, places, food, and transport options based on intake data.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanPage: Renders a trip plan page that loads a trip by ID, handles loading/error states, and displays tabbed sections for overview, budget, todos, and emergency info.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanView: Displays a detailed trip overview with dates, destination info, generated suggestions, and interactive map links using trip data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading/storing identities and offering login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, trip plans, currencies, and mutations like creating or deleting trips.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and a premium color theme with both light and dark mode palette variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides helper functions to format amounts as INR currency or plain numbers.
frontend/src/utils/maps.ts: Generates URL-encoded Google Maps search URLs for destinations and places.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature metadata for the TripMuse travel assistant.
